full_summary:
# Field Support Services Project (FSSP) in Mozambique

### Project Overview

The Field Support Services Project (FSSP) aims to provide expert technical and logistical support to ensure effective and efficient development assistance in Mozambique and countries accredited to Canada's High Commission to Mozambique.

### Project Objectives

The primary objectives of the FSSP are to:

* Provide access to local technical expertise
* Facilitate Canada's commitment to improving health, education, gender equality, economic resilience, conflict resolution, and good governance in Mozambique
* Ensure that development assistance is aligned with Canada's Feminist International Assistance Policy (FIAP) and the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)

### Project Overview Description

According to the request for proposal (RFP), the FSSP will be implemented to meet development needs and priorities in Mozambique, with a focus on promoting gender equality and supporting the empowerment of women and girls. The project will be fully aligned with the Paris Declaration and Accra Agenda for Action principles.

### Relevant Documents and Attachments

To ensure that you have a comprehensive understanding of the project requirements, please review the following documents and attachments:

* [Field Support Services Project (FSSP) RFI Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34965/23-227256---rfp-fss-mozambique.pdf)
* [FSSP Amendment 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34965/23-227256---rfp-fss-mozambique---amendment-1.pdf)
* [FSSP Amendment 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34965/23-227256---rfp-fss-mozambique---amendment-2.pdf)
* [RFQ & FAQ Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34965/23-227256---rfp-questions-and-answers-3.pdf)
